name: The Woryl
description:
The Woryl is a cute game I made for the  #wannayamjam hosted by  Manisha W and Sam Yam, the theme of this game jam is combination, I made it thinking that two players on the same room can enjoy some competition on feeding their Woryl

This game was designed as an HTML5 game however I have noticed some bugs appeared during testing, so if you experience some and still want to play the game I will also include the PC version in a zip

All the art was done in Aseprite and programming in Gamemaker studio 2, the art and programming is done by me Mecha Brain, be sure to follow me on my socials, I have some free anime wallpapers on my kofi shop if you are interested.

All the music and sfx  are from Opengameart.org

Credits

Art & Programmming: Mecha Brain
